page.title: 10HINDU DAY
page.content: I wake up sleepy, I read a comic. Then I go downstairs. Most of the time I don't have my breakfast because I'm going to be late for school. I call for my friend's David and Shabier and Shabier's brother. Then I go to the shops. After that I go to school. After school I meet my friends and go to the temple. I come back at 7:15. Then we go shopping. I like to get sweets, pop, cake, crisps and comics. When I get home we watch a video. In the middle of the film I go upstairs and read a comic. When I am tired I go to sleep. At school my favourite subject is computers. The worst subject is Mental Arithmetic. When I go to the Temple I learn Punjabi. I wear ordinary clothes. Only Hindu's are allowed but I go to learn or have fun.
